trans-unit.source: Creates a new verb to be used with the designer using the associated verb group, text and event handler.
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The ActivityDesignerVerb describes an action to take against a workflow component.
ActivityDesignerVerb options are displayed in the menu bar and right-click context menus during design time.

The ActivityDesignerVerb will be grouped with other verbs associated with the same <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup> and are displayed in the corresponding sub-menu at design time.
The event handler passed when creating a new verb will be invoked when this verb is chosen from the menu.

Initializes an instance of an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb"></xref> by using an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>, a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup"></xref> value, a description of the verb, and an <xref:System.EventHandler>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to associate with the new verb.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup"></xref> in which the new verb belongs.
The description of the verb to show on the menu.
The <xref:System.EventHandler> that will handle the menu selection event.
text is empty or a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
-or- invokeHandler is a null reference ().

Initializes an instance of a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb"></xref> by using an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>, a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup"></xref> value, a description of the verb, and two <xref:System.EventHandler> objects, one to handle menu selection events and the other to handle status updates.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to associate with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup"></xref> in which this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb"></xref> belongs.
The description of the verb to show on the menu.
The event handler that handles the menu selection event.
The event handler that handles status updates.
Gets a new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"></xref> for an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb"></xref>.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> is useful for placing items on a menu bar or context menu.
A new CommandID object.
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb"></xref>.
Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup> to associate verbs together on a menu bar or context menu.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup"></xref> object.
Gets an integer that describes the status of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb"></xref>.
The `OleStatus` contains a mixture of flags that reflect the state of this menu item.

An <xref uid="langword_csharp_int" name="int" href=""></xref> that describes the <xref uid="langword_csharp_OleStatus" name="OleStatus" href=""></xref> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb"></xref>.
